definition:
To wind or collect into a ball; hence, to gather into a mass or anything like a mass. Where he builds the agglomerated pile. Cowper.

To collect in a mass.

1. A collection or mass. 2. (Geol.)  A mass of angular volcanic fragments united by heat; -- distinguished from conglomerate.

1. Collected into a ball, heap, or mass. 2. (Bot.)  Collected into a rounded head of flowers.
